original_text: “So I advise you: Let all Israel, from Dan to Beersheba—as numerous as the sand on the seashore—be gathered to you, with you yourself leading them into battle.
korean_text: 나는 이렇게 계략을 세웠나이다 온 이스라엘을 단부터 브엘세바까지 바닷가의 많은 모래 같이 당신께로 모으고 친히 전장에 나가시고

sentences.original_text: Let all Israel, from Dan to Beersheba
as numerous as the sand on the seashore
with you yourself leading them into battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 직접 그들을 전투로 이끌게 하십시오.
